channel.title: Gold4RS Scam (FUNNY)
channel.description:
Ok so two weeks ago I decide to buy 50M at gold4RS for $35.00 I see that they are working on the account for a while but they suddenly stopped after the RuneScape update, check these 'Live Chat' Conversations.
[code]Operator: Welcome to Gold4RS, How may I help you? Me: I bought 50M from you guys and you stopped on my order, can you continue? Operator: What's your Runescape name? Me: Dev***** Operator: We already finished your order sir. Me: I just got on today, you put 500k on the account, I ordered 50M. The Chat session has ended.[/code]
An hour later...
[code]Operator: Welcome to Gold4RS, How may I help you? Me: Please finish the order for the account Dev*****. Operator: What's your Runescape name? Me: You stupid? Dev*****. Operator: I do not see an order under this account name, sir. Me: I spent fucking $35.00 you bitch. Operator: The prices have changed, sir. Me: Well, then give me my money back. Operator: You are going to have to pay the full price, sir. Me: Give me my fucking money back, I don't want to pay the full price. The Chat session has ended.[/code]
An Hour later...
[code]Operator: Welcome to Gold4RS, How may I help you? Me: FUCK you, cocklicker give me my money back. Operator: We don't have an order from you, sir. Me: You serious? FAGGOT. The Chat session has ended.[/code]
Funny. Just like every other site. All scams.

item.title: Gold4RS Scam (FUNNY)
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

reyx7:

See, I think, now that free trade is out, you should be able to just meet a user in game, and they just give it to you.

Thats how it used to be, back in 07 when i bought gold

But that was from vclord

Best gold buying site, great staff, never been scammed, always got the job done.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold4RS Scam (FUNNY)
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

All I can say is: oh well. This isn’t even a legitimate business. You can force them to return payments. You agree to their terms when you give them money, it’s up to them to even do anything for you at all. If you don’t want to trust these people with your money and hope they deliver, then don’t buy gold…

Read full topic

[quote=“SacredHeart, post:23, topic:381106”]No there not scammers, If the prices change you need to pay extra. Happened to my mate, He ordered 10k dragon arrows for 35 and they stopped it becuz they rose.[/quote]That’s scamming.

item.title: Gold4RS Scam (FUNNY)
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Typhis Lord Typhis
item.description:
@Lord_Typhis wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:21, topic:381106”][quote author=Lord Typhis link=topic=476921.msg3491688#msg3491688 date=1296973262]

2 weeks ago 50m wasn’t 35$. You have to be bsing

Gold Farmng for Members W/ Combat levels over 110+ was $35.00 for 50M, I had also powerleveled my woodcutting, so that brought the price down. (Which they also did not do)

The biggest reason why I posted this is to tell people to be careful of RS gold buying sites, most of them are scams.

As for the people who don’t believe me, I really don’t care.
[/quote]
This is why you dont goldfarm

Free trade lol, shoulda just waited.[/quote]

Yeah, agreed, but look at the prices now.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold4RS Scam (FUNNY)
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Typhis Lord Typhis
item.description:
@Lord_Typhis wrote:

CoonHunter:

I have ordered like 3 sets of 5M, and had no issues. Possibly, the reason you are not getting your order, is because you are not supposed to log into your account until they inform you (by you asking), if the order is complete. If given the right worker, they will mark your order as complete and u loose out, for breaking the 1st thing they ask you not to do.

I gotmon the account because I saw that they had stopped and I didn’t know why, they still haven’t resumed.

Read full topic
